explanation: This lineup represents the pinnacle of Al Ittihad’s history – the team that took the field during the 2005 AFC Champions League Final. Under the guidance of coach Angelo Alessio and a tactical 4-3-3 formation, the club’s best‐ever XI showcased exceptional unity, defensive solidity, and attacking prowess in one of its most defining matches. Every player listed not only played together in that historic final but also contributed to a performance that remains a benchmark for excellence, making this lineup a symbol of peak achievement in the club’s illustrious history.
